triples.name: Belief revision
triples.relevance: The paper incorporates ideas from belief revision theory to construct its logic of conditional doxastic actions.

triples.name: Dynamic logic (modal logic)
triples.relevance: Dynamic logic of epistemic actions provides the foundational framework that the paper extends with belief revision concepts.

triples.name: Doxastic logic
triples.relevance: Doxastic logic for reasoning about beliefs forms the basis of the paper's conditional doxastic actions framework.

triples.name: Conditional doxastic actions
triples.relevance: The paper introduces this new logical framework by combining belief revision theory with dynamic logic of epistemic actions.
